item.description:
Joe English has a nice trail system with a beaver pond. Directions: From Bedford Police station, take rte. 101 towards amherst/milford for 9 miles. Take a right on Horace Greely rd.(there's a store on the corner). Go @ 0.4 miles and take a left on Brook rd. and follow to the end. My cell # is 785-2294

I've decided to put a 20 person limit on this meetup. there will probaly be other people there enjoying the trails so I have taken that and parking into consideration. See you there :)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the parking lot, black expedition

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Joe English Reservation
